feed.title: Raw Transaction RPC calls for bitcoind

entry.title: Raw Transaction RPC calls for bitcoind
entry.summary: Peter submitted a feature request to allow private keys to be provided at the command line with the signature, so that the client can function as a wallet-less signature machine. Gavin Andresen has already submitted a pull request that implements low-level "raw" transaction and is seeking feedback on the API and assistance in testing it.
